projects.Title: QuestSearch
projects.Description: A powerful search engine that fetches relevant results across multiple platforms, integrating AI for enhanced recommendations.

projects.Title: SociaLink
projects.Description: A social media aggregator that consolidates updates from multiple networks into a single, streamlined feed.

projects.Title: Smart Voice
projects.Description: A voice-powered assistant application that enables users to perform tasks using speech recognition and AI automation.

projects.Title: Contest Tracker
projects.Description: A contest tracking web app that fetches upcoming competitive programming contests from multiple sources, with filters and reminders.

projects.Title: Food Recipe App
projects.Description: A recipe management application where users can explore, save, and share their favorite dishes with a sleek and interactive UI.
